nodes.text: The Roundtree system was located in the Trailing Sectors portion of the Inner Rim. At some point by 2 BBY, the Human male Rekkon was born in the Roundtree system as the only child in a middle class family.

The Roundtree system was first mentioned in the 1993 West End Games sourcebook Han Solo and the Corporate Sector Sourcebook, authored by Michael Allen Horne for use with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the system in grid square M-14.
